properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:30PM PST until March 2 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas
15 to 20 feet at 15 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
